General.Name: Global Dividend Growth Split Corp
General.Description: Global Dividend Growth Split Corp. is an equity mutual fund launched and managed by Brompton Funds Limited. The fund invests in the public equity markets across the globe. It invests in the growth stocks of companies with large-capitalization. Global Dividend Growth Split Corp. was formed on April 24, 2018 and is domiciled in Canada
General.Address: Bay Wellington Tower, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 2T3
